detectors.description: Contract CoreV1_Relaunch (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreV1_Relaunch.sol#14-75) is not in CapWords

CoreV1_Relaunch.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreV1_Relaunch.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreV1_Relaunch.sol#16)
